short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically add or remove items from a "preferred" collection on Envato Market™ with one simple click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically add or remove items from a "preferred" collection you specify with one simple click.  Save some time when rounding up photos, graphics, or other media for your next creative project.  You can even turn the entire item thumbnail into one big "add to collection" button.
